mapper.select: select coalesce(sum(mf.balance), 0) as fundsInPlatform, coalesce(q.funds, 0) as fundsOutPlatform, coalesce(sum(md.amount), 0) as savingInPlatform, coalesce(q.saving, 0) as savingOutPlatform, coalesce(sum(mi.price), 0) as insuranceInPlatform, coalesce(q.insurance, 0) as insuranceOutPlatform, coalesce(sum(ms.amount), 0) as stocksInPlatform, coalesce(q.stocks, 0) as stocksOutPlatform, coalesce(sum(mg.amount), 0) as goldInPlatform, coalesce(q.gold, 0) as goldOutPlatform, coalesce(sum(mb.amount), 0) as bondInPlatform, coalesce(q.bond, 0) as bondOutPlatform from questionnaire q, my_fund mf, my_depo md, my_ins mi, my_stock ms, my_gold mg, my_bond mb where q.user_id = #{userId} and mf.user_id = #{userId} and md.user_id = #{userId} and mi.user_id = #{userId} and ms.user_id = #{userId} and mg.user_id = #{userId} and mb.user_id = #{userId};

select coalesce(today.stocks, 0) as todayStocks, coalesce(today.gold, 0) as todayGold, coalesce(today.bond, 0) as todayBond, coalesce(yesterday.stocks, 0) as yesterdayStocks, coalesce(yesterday.gold, 0) as yesterdayGold, coalesce(yesterday.bond, 0) as yesterdayBond from (select stocks, gold, bond from fortune where user_id = #{userId} and record_date = CURDATE()) today, (select stocks, gold, bond from fortune where user_id = #{userId} and record_date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) yesterday
select d.name as name, md.amount as money, d.rate as annualizedRate, md.endtime as expirationDate from my_depo md inner join deposit_product d on md.id = d.id where md.user_id = #{userId}
